basics.name: Paul Charpie
basics.label: IT Technician | MSP & Healthcare IT Support | Microsoft 365 • Azure • Hardware/Software Support
basics.summary: Experienced IT professional with a background in MSP support and healthcare technology. Skilled in managing end-user support for hardware, software, and clinical systems, overseeing IT projects, and maintaining networked environments. Adept at troubleshooting, collaborating with teams, and providing clear guidance to non-technical users, with a strong focus on reliability and patient-centered outcomes.

work.name: Unbound Digital
highlights: Managed Help Desk team, scaling from 1 to 5 members while maintaining high client satisfaction
Supported 1,400+ devices across 100+ healthcare and business clients, ensuring uptime and compliance
Directed IT projects including migrating companies from on-premises servers to Microsoft 365 (Exchange, SharePoint, Teams, Intune)
Installed and supported client/server networks, peer-to-peer systems, and clinical devices
Communicated complex technical issues clearly to non-technical users, aligning with SLAs

work.name: Premier Dental Lab
highlights: Supported and maintained dental CAD/CAM systems, 3D printers, and milling machines in a clinical environment
Provided technical support for computer systems and networked devices
Collaborated with dentists and staff to ensure reliable technology workflows in patient care

work.name: Gray Station Dental
highlights: Led a 3-person team coordinating daily operations across 6 treatment rooms
Managed IT-related installs and documentation exceeding healthcare requirements
Supported staff and patients with technical issues related to clinical systems and devices

work.name: Hawkins Computer Services
highlights: Maintained enterprise software platforms and provided technical support for client environments
Managed deployments using Docker and cloud infrastructure
Authored technical documentation and trained end-users on software and hardware usage

skills.name: Project & Team Management
keywords: Client onboarding and IT project coordination
